Text:
Thanks -johnny-!
Great upload.  Very timely considering many more Poles recently died in Russia, on their way to Katyn.
No English is spoken in this movie, no alternate audio tracks, and there are no English Subtitles.
You can DL the subs at an alternate website only after you give them all kinds of your personal information. I wont do it...

I take back the above comment. Knowing which links to click on gives you access to the subs file without having to provide your personal information. I would prefer these kinds of things  not be separated from the original torrent though. It wasted too much of my time.
Oh shut up and go away.
@bxb. Your torrent has incorrect aspect ratio, and the quality is inferior, and there are no seeds, and this one is well seeded. Kindly step aside.
@jonny: care to grace us with the couple of frame dumps so we could compare the two? and explain 'incorrect' a/r in my torrent and what made you to come to this conclusion?

@jonny: I take my questions back - just noticed the a/r of the original bluray is 2.38:1, while my torrent stands at 1.78:1, thus portions of the source were cropped out. Still, it is 720p and looks much sharper=better IMO.
no it doesn't, bxb, and no one wants hardcoded polish subs. mine looks much better and the aspect ratio is correct.
ehunter, go e hunt some gratitude you douche bag!!!!
